awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Exponents and Symmetries of          Operator-Stable Laws
awd_abstract_narration: The principal investigator studies limit theorems for                      independent, identically distributed random vectors.  In                        particular he will focus on the more tractable case of operator-                stable random vectors.  He plans to characterize associated                     symmetry groups of operator-stable laws.                                             Limit theorems for sums of independent random variables are                the foundation of mathematical statistics.  In more than one                    dimension the corresponding analysis focuses on limit theorems                  for sums of independent random vectors.  The principal                          investigator will investigate the specific case of the operator-                stable class of probability laws.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
